channel.title: Memoes on WADRO
channel.description: Recent content in Memoes on WADRO

item.title: Blockchain and Finance Thoughts
item.description: How will blockchain change financial services? Drastically saying, you don’t need any private bank, just currency. You do your own bank on local device. There is no gold, so no gold-paper. More elegant way, more independent, more certainty. Data will be stored in your device, not 3rd ones. We can make our own service with many plug-ins. Financial services like saving money, so banks have earned more money until now.

However, they only characterize the environment in which blockchain can operate. The heart of distributed ledger technology (DLT) is the consensus protocol. ì´ì „ ê²Œì‹œë¬¼ì—ì„œ ë‹¤ì–‘í•œ ìœ í˜•ì˜ ë¸”ë¡ì²´ì¸ì— ëŒ€í•´ ì„¤ëª…í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ê·¸ëŸ¬ë‚˜ ê·¸ê²ƒë“¤ì€ ë¸”ë¡ì²´ì¸ì´ ì‘ë™í• ìˆ˜ ìˆëŠ” í™˜ê²½ë§Œì„ íŠ¹ì§•ì§“ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ë¶„ì‚° ì›ì¥ ê¸°ìˆ (DLT)ì˜ í•µì‹¬ì€ í•©ì˜ í”„ë¡œí† ì½œì…ë‹ˆë‹¤. Interestingly, mathematicians and engineers have been developing distributed networks and consensensus protocols for decades but only with the emergence of Bitcoin has this technology made a leap forward.
